title: Steel Panthers MBT / WW2 2016
description:
STEEL PANTHERS WORLD WAR 2 / MAIN BATTLE TANK
16 edition

Features:
- WinSPWW2 update 9.0b / WinSPMBT update 10.0b
- Enhanced CD mode with high resolutions
- Modern OS colour fix and fullscreen support
- Improved sound effects (Cross Sound Mod 1.2)
- PDF manuals

Steel Panthers is a series of turn-based tactical wargames with the unit-level command employing various military technologies available from mid-20th century till today.
Apart from a dozen of campaigns with persistent army setup through each mission and hundreds of single scenarios the random map/scenario/campaign generator is also available further expanding the gameplay time.

Reading the game manual is strongly recommended
